CustomField.formula: If(!ISBLANK(Model_c__c), If(!ISBLANK( Contact_Person__c ), Contact_Person__r.LastName + ' - ' + Model_c__r.Name, Lead__r.LastName + ' - ' + Model_c__r.Name), If(!ISBLANK( Contact_Person__c ), Contact_Person__r.LastName, Lead__r.LastName))
CustomField.label: Opportunity Auto Name
